dcterms:creator: Wei Xu
Chris Callison-Burch
Courtney Napoles
dcterms:description: A document simplification dataset consisting of 1,130 English news articles that have been manually rewritten by professional editors at five different discrete reading levels (0-4) of increasing simplicity.
dcterms:title: Newsela

dcterms:creator: Daiki Yanamoto
Tomoki Ikawa
Tomoyuki Kajiwara
Takashi Ninomiya
Satoru Uchida
Yuki Arase
dcterms:description: Standard English Wikipedia articles used for evaluating document-level simplification models, known to contain noise and poor quality when considered at the document level.
dcterms:title: English Wikipedia (EW)

dcterms:creator: Daiki Yanamoto
Tomoki Ikawa
Tomoyuki Kajiwara
Takashi Ninomiya
Satoru Uchida
Yuki Arase
dcterms:description: Simple English Wikipedia articles that are often used as reference simplifications but are known to contain a lot of noise.
dcterms:title: Simple English Wikipedia (SEW)

dcterms:creator: Daiki Yanamoto
Tomoki Ikawa
Tomoyuki Kajiwara
Takashi Ninomiya
Satoru Uchida
Yuki Arase
dcterms:description: A knowledge base that provides structured data for various entities, used to annotate articles for semantic types.
dcterms:title: WikiData
